text: Universal healthcare in Lebanon under threat due to privatization? 🤕 Social security contributions and national institution budgets are dwindling, leaving the Ministry of Public Health struggling. 💰 Several draft bills have been proposed but ignored. 🤷‍♂️ Political parties are pushing for private initiatives, threatening the role of the NSSF as the main insurer of private sector workers. 💳 It's time to prioritize a strong and sustainable social security institution to ensure universal health coverage for all! 🌎
